function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decrease in park use during COVID-19","Impact":"Reduced outdoor activity may lead to decreased physical and mental well-being, and increased sedentary behavior.","Mitigation":"Promote outdoor activities through public health campaigns, accessible green spaces, and community engagement programs.","Technologies":"Smartphone apps for activity tracking, remote health monitoring technologies.","People":"Population in urban areas, especially those with low socioeconomic status and limited access to outdoor spaces.","Owner":"Public health authorities, local governments, community organizations."},{"Description":"Statistically significant decline in park visits","Impact":"Indicates a substantial change in behavior and potential health impacts on the community.","Mitigation":"Investigate the reasons behind the decline, conduct community surveys, and implement targeted interventions to encourage outdoor activities.","Technologies":"Survey tools, data analytics for behavior analysis, targeted communication strategies.","People":"Community members, public health professionals, urban planners.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, local governments."}]}
